entry.title: Bitcoin Knots 0.21.1.knots20210629 released
entry.summary: Bitcoin Knots version 0.21.1.knots20210629 has been released, which can be downloaded from bitcoinknots.org. The new release includes updated translations, various bug fixes, and performance improvements. Users are encouraged to report any bugs using the issue tracker at GitHub. To receive security and update notifications, users should subscribe to announcements at bitcoinknots.org. For more information on the release notes and change log, visit the GitHub link provided.
